posts.post_content:
This card entered my collection many years ago via a board member. Now it is time for it to move on to someone else. 

Tim used to live in a PSA 2 plastic house but was freed from it long ago. He is still looking quite well after all these years and has a great image for a 19th century Allen & Ginter card.

See images below to help you form an opinion on condition. PM or post in thread with any questions or requests.

Price is $OLD

PayPal FF preferred. If PayPal G&S add $10. Shipping and insurance is included.
